title: Code Quality & Review Toolkit
description: Comprehensive suite of tools for maintaining high code quality through automated reviews, testing, and best practice enforcement. Essential for teams focused on code excellence.
author: JSONbored

items.reason: Performs in-depth code reviews with actionable suggestions
Automatically generates unit and integration tests
Explains complex code sections for better understanding

troubleshooting.issue: Code reviewer agent rejects tests generated by generate-tests
troubleshooting.solution: Install code-reviewer-agent first to establish quality standards. Then install generate-tests to create tests matching those standards. Configure test generation to follow reviewer's style guide.

troubleshooting.issue: Generate-tests command missing required testing framework
troubleshooting.solution: Install testing framework before collection: npm install -D jest @types/jest or npm install -D vitest. Verify test runner in package.json scripts. Reinstall generate-tests after framework setup.

troubleshooting.issue: Explain command output conflicts with reviewer agent's suggestions
troubleshooting.solution: Use explain command for understanding existing code, code-reviewer-agent for improvement suggestions. Install both per installationOrder. They serve complementary purposes, not conflicting ones.

troubleshooting.issue: Collection items cannot find codebase root directory
troubleshooting.solution: Ensure Git repository initialized in project root: git init. All collection items detect project root via .git directory. Open Claude Code in repository root, not subdirectory.

troubleshooting.issue: Test generation fails due to TypeScript configuration issues
troubleshooting.solution: Verify tsconfig.json includes test files in compilation. Add test directory to include array. Install @types packages for testing framework. Restart Claude Code after TypeScript config changes.
